      • createRequest

        public boolean createRequest(Point2D targetPos)
        Create a path finding request and register it in the time slice service Note: This function is not a searching function, it only register a request
        Specified by:
        createRequest in interface NavigationService
        Parameters:
        targetPos - the targetPos that the bot wants to reach
        Returns:
        true if closest nodes exist around both bot and targetPosition, otherwise false

        public double getCostToClosestItem(int GiverType)
        This method makes use of the pre-calculated lookup table.

      • cycleOnce

        public SearchStatus cycleOnce()
        called by time slice service manager
        Returns:
        the status of the search process 0 if target_found 1 if not found 2 if the search is not completed;

      • resetToNoTask

        public void resetToNoTask()
        Description copied from interface: NavigationService
        Resets the search status to no_task. This is useful to not repeat the searches after target was found
